title: when i start a game the actual game window doesn't load in, now i'm in low priority
body: so yeah, i've tried twice now in 2 days to boot up a ranked game, both times we go through champ select no problem, then when it gets time to get into game instead of the loading screen it just has the client come up with the reconnect option, when i click reconnect it doesn't do anything. now i'm in low priority queues. my account has almost no history of afk behaviour and i dont mind the loss of LP i just wanna play, preferably not in low priority. if anyone can offer a fix to this issue that would be ideal

replies.body: That can happen when you network fails to bridge the new connection with the game server you're trying to connect to. Should be easy enough to fix up by adjusting a couple of your network settings. Check out the steps on Port Forwarding and DNS settings in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that helps by testing them in a custom game first.
It seems to be sorted, sorry it took so long, had a bunch of non league things that needed doing. thanks for the help mate
